60 Armor
60 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste

  • Fortify: Taking damage from a champion grants a stack of 5% bonus Armor and 5% bonus Magic Resist for 6 seconds.

    Max 5 stacks; 1 per champion.

act.name: Monolith
act.description: Gain a shield for 100 (+ 90% bonus health), decaying over 2.5 seconds, and 25% increased size while active.

pass.name: Fortify
pass.description: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.

3211.description:
250 Health
25 Magic Resist

pass.description: After taking damage from a champion, gain 150% base health regeneration for up to 10 seconds. Duration increases with subsequent champion damage taken.

20% Heal and Shield Power
50 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Purify: Remove all crowd control debuffs (except Knockups and Suppression) from an ally champion and restore 100 - 180 (based on ally level) Health (120s cooldown).

act.name: Purify
act.description: Remove all crowd control debuffs (except Airborne, Blind, Disarm, Ground, Nearsight, and Suppression) from yourself or an allied champion and heal the target for 100 − 180 (based on level).

3330.name: Scarecrow Effigy
3330.description:
Cannot be sold

Active - Trinket: Places an effigy that lasts for 130 - 300 (based on level) seconds and appears exactly as Fiddlesticks does to enemies. Stores one charge every 115 - 30 (based on level) seconds, up to maximum 2 charges.

Enemy champions approaching an effigy will activate it, causing the effigy to fake a random action, after which the effigy will fall apart.

act.name: Trinket
act.description: Consume a charge to place a visible Effigy at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area. The effigy visually appears exactly as Fiddlesticks does to enemies while idle. Enemy champions that approach an effigy while having sight of it will activate it, causing the effigy to fake a random action, after which the effigy will deal 1 damage to itself.

3340.name: Stealth Ward
3340.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

act.name: Trinket
act.description: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on level) seconds.

3363.name: Farsight Alteration
3363.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

act.name: Trinket
act.description: Reveals an area for 2 seconds. Enemy champions inside the area at the time of placement will be revealed for 5 seconds. This does not affect stealthed champions. Also places a visible Farsight Ward at the target location that lasts indefinitely.

3364.name: Oracle Lens
3364.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

act.description: Summons a Sweeper Drone that escorts you for the next 10 seconds.

3400.name: Your Cut
3400.description:
Active - Consume: Gain 0 gold.

Bonus gold given to an ally when Pyke executes an enemy champion using his Ultimate Ability. If no ally was involved in the kill, Pyke gets to keep the Cut!
3400.limit: Only granted by Pyke's Death from Below.

effects.consume: Grants undefined-7+x;0+ ‒ undefined, increased by 100 for First Blood. Can be used while dead.

60 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Sanctify: Healing or Shielding another ally enhances you both for 6 seconds, granting your Attacks 10% - 30% (based on ally level) Attack Speed and 5 - 20 (based on ally level) magic damage On-Hit.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

pass.name: Sanctify
pass.description: Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) enhances you and them with 10% − 30% (based on level) bonus attack speed and 5 − 20 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit on basic attacks for 6 seconds.

pass.name: Spellblade
pass.description: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and restores mana equal to 40% base AD (+ 16% bonus AD).
pass.cd: 1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack)

3513.name: Eye of the Herald
3513.description:
Active - Consume: Crush the Eye of the Herald after 1 second, summoning the Rift Herald to siege enemy turrets.

  • Glimpse of the Void: The holder of the Eye of the Herald has Empowered Recall.

    The Eye of the Herald will be lost to the Void if not used within 240 seconds.
3513.limit: The Eye of the Herald will be lost if not used within 240 seconds.

effects.consume: Unique|Herald's Call|Channel for 1 second and summon the Eye of the Herald in front of you, which is crushed over 5 seconds to summon an allied Rift Herald that sieges enemy structures. This effect is placed on a 3-second cooldown while in combat with non-minions.

pass.name: Glimpse of the Void
pass.description: Gain <simple-tooltip dname="Empowered Recall" data-spellkey="Empowered Recall">Empowered Recall</simple-tooltip>.

3599.description: Active - Consume: Bind with an ally for the remainder of the game, becoming Oathsworn Allies. Oathsworn empowers you both while near one another.

act.name: Oathsworn Bond
act.description: After a 3.5-second cast time and a 3-second channel afterwards from the user and the target allied champion, both become bound allies. The target is unable to act for 6 seconds after the channel's duration. Afterwards, the target is dubbed Oathsworn.

    ''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake
3742.limit: Ranged champions do not apply the slow.

pass.name: Shipwrecker
pass.description: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum each 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks on-hit to deal 0 to 100 ‒ undefined (+ 0 to 100 ‒ undefined base AD) bonus physical damage. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.

30 Attack Damage
500 Health

    Deals 75% for Ranged users. On-Hit damage is also applied to Structures.
    Cleave's shockwave does not trigger on structures.

pass2.name: Cleave

Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 90 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.
